requestBody.title: Owner reviews consolidated calendar state API Trace

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

requestBody.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

evidence.error: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Override/waiver audit trail". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
data.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

evidence.error: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.
